baseline_groups.claim_summary: DEA crackdowns on pill mill doctors reduce county-level opioid dispensing.
baseline_groups.notes: Coef = -35.4 (SE = 6.4, p < 0.0001). Staggered DiD with county + state-by-year FE.

global_notes: Staggered DiD using ARCOS opioid dispensing data (2006-2014). Very robust result. FE are critical: without county FE, coefficient is positive.
